effect:
If a Pokémon with Flame Body is hit by a move that makes contact, there is a 30% chance the attacker will become burned.
If a Pokémon with Flame Body (or Magma Armor) and a Pokémon Egg are both in the party Pokémon, the number of steps required to hatch the egg are halved.
description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
